title: (x) Trasher Skateboarding Magazine logo tagline - Eurostile Extd {Stephen}
content:
Whats up

I know the font for thrasher is banco but what is the font for the Skateboarding Magazine, I'm sure I have used it before but its escaped my mind does anyone know?

[http://www.blog.lessrain.com/wp-content/upload/trasher.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020021431/http:/www.blog.lessrain.com/wp-content/upload/trasher.jpg "http://www.blog.lessrain.com/wp-content/upload/trasher.jpg")
author: KenOath

comments.content: This should go in the Type Identification Board.
Thankyou, sorry new to this I only just realized that there was a type id board.
No problem, we allow the newbies some leeway. :^P

There's also some Avant Garde on that cover, and "L.A." might be Compacta.

- Lex
